title: unable to log into riot games support website

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

replies.body:
That's pretty strange!  I'm curious if your link to the login section is set to another region other than NA?  You can check on your url bar.  No worries, though, because we actually don't want you logging in for an account recovery.  

We have a more specific [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) for cases just like this, which will allow you to use an email address you have access to.  Fill that out and our account team will get back to you as soon as they can!

When i tried filling out one of the forms, it said that my account was suspended???

i have no idea what this means since i'm able to get onto league of legends fine?

https://gyazo.com/6c3e77f7c1eed9c92d71993c4f928d2a
No worries, hit us up directly via email at support@riotgames.com.  We'll be able to reach you via email just fine!
